#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        cout << endl;
        long long int n,k;
        cin >> n >> k;
        vector<long long int> v;
        long long int sum = 0;
        for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            long long int y;
            cin >> y;
            v.push_back(y);
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        for (int i = n-1; i >= n-k; i--)
            sum += v[i];
        cout << sum << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
